title: Can we FINALLY have Draft Mode?
body:
It was my favourite game mode, the perfect combination of ranked and normals. It was like heaven, no trolls want to queue up and wait an extra 5 minutes to play, so the game had a LOT less trolls overall.

Our community has a buttload of people now and could definitely support it, I mean if you can justify adding Team Builder you can DEFINITELY add draft mode.

I'm also sick of vsing a Fiora every game and being able to ban her would be swell and lovely.

Thanks for reading, if you support let Riot know in the comments. Not really interested in negative comments from people who want to tell me to suck it up and play ranked or to play normals or what this would make other queues longer (which it wouldn't, look at teambuilder..)

replies.body: Honestly Riot probably wants to do this, but they need a larger player base. I don't know if you've played team builder recently, but unless you play at peak hours, you could be waiting up to an hour and a half for a support. This pretty much shows how we just need more people playing, before we can have some of these queues.
No it doesn't, if they can justify keeping us having TB (Draft got pulled for shorter queues), then they damn well can give us draft.
This + 24/7 ranked is what I miss about being on NA... Sometimes it feels like the ping would be worth it -_-
Mm, I wish Riot would actually listen..

I AGREE, Plz Riot, and also make it available to people say lvl25+ so they can get a feel for the aura that is ranked.
And the ability to band would be amazing, there are some champions i just cant stand being in a game with!
THX RITO PLZ LISTEN

I see what you're saying.. I think they should remove Team Builder altogether and replace it with Draft. Still the same amount of queues then, and hell, we'd probably steal back a bit of the player base who play on the NA server to play Draft!
Also with the free transfers from NA to OCE we should have more people playing now, shouldn't we?

> Our community has a buttload of people now and **could definitely support it**

Oh definitely, what with out 20/7 ranked, 30/3 Normal Twisted Treeline, almost completely unused 20/7 Teambuilder with 30+ minute queues, complete lack of Ranked Twisted Treeline, complete lack of Crystal Scar **and** off-peak ARAM queues up to 20 minutes... Our little community can ***definitely*** support another queue...

It would be nice to have more queues but first things first, we need to actually use all the queues we have (and actually have them available 24/7).
